### Descriptions

<div style="float:left">An automated dashboard which daily updates the corona virus cases. 

<br>

The dashboard is made by:

<li>R / RStudio - language and IDE</li>
<li>Flexdashboard - dashboard tool</li> 
<li>Leaflet - mapping</li> 
<li>Highcharters - charts library</li>

<br>
